overview: An amateur film made by and starring the husband and wife duo, John & Evelyn Kibar. After Mrs. Kibar asks Mr. Kibar to throw away his old collectables, or “junk,” Mr. Kibar begins reflecting on past travels. Only later do we find out this travel sequence is actually just a dream. Title cards displaying dialogue are dispersed throughout the film. A corresponding 1/4" audio reel for this title is also housed at CFA, but has yet to be digitally transferred.
title: Nostalgia
